"""
文字列をアルファベット順にN文字ずらす
"""

n = int(input())
s = list(input())

# 文字列をアルファベット順にずらす
for i in range(len(s)):
    s[i] = chr((ord(s[i]) - ord('A') + n) % 26 + ord('A'))

print(''.join(s))

# my answer
n = int(input())
s = input()
result = ""

for i in s:
    result += chr(ord(i) + n) if ord(i) + n <= 90 else chr(ord(i) + n - 26)

print(result)

# shortest answer in yukicoder
print("".join(chr((ord(i) - 64 + int(input())) % 26 + 64) for i in input()))

# Get the input
n = int(input())
s = input()

# Convert each letter to the letter n places to the right
shifted = [chr(ord(c) + n) if ord(c) + n <= ord("Z") else chr(ord(c) + n - 26) for c in s]

# Print the result
print("".join(shifted))

import sys

n = int(input())
s = str(input())

# sを辞書順で並べ替えて、n文字ずらしたものを辞書順で並べ替えたものとすると、
# n文字ずらしたものの辞書順は、sの辞書順 + n で求まる

# sを辞書順で並べ替え
s = ''.join(sorted(list(s)))

# n文字ずらしたものを辞書順で並べ替え
s = ''.join(sorted(s[n:] + s[:n]))

print(s)

def main():
    n = int(input())
    s = input()
    shift = n % 26
    alphabet = 'ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'
    shift_alphabet = alphabet[shift:] + alphabet[:shift]
    print(''.join(shift_alphabet[alphabet.index(c)] for c in s))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n = int(input())
s = input()

chars = []
for i in s:
    chars.append(chr((ord(i) - ord('A') + n)%26 + ord('A')))

print(''.join(chars))

N = int(input())
S = input()

#string.ascii_uppercase -> "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ"
#ord() function -> returns the ASCII value of a character
#chr() function -> returns the character from ASCII value

for s in S:
    print(chr(ord(s) + N) if ord(s) + N <= ord("Z") else chr(ord(s) + N - 26), end="")
